name: Dongmoon Kim
summary: Experienced Fullstack Developer with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in .NET, ReactJS, JavaScript, and C#. Strong engineering professional with a focus on creating efficient, scalable, and user-friendly applications. Passionate about clean code, problem-solving, and continuous learning in the ever-evolving field of technology.
personal_statement: Eager to embrace and learn new technologies, I am continuously seeking opportunities to expand my skill set and contribute to innovative projects in the tech industry.
